name: Badlands[online] (Alpha)
description:
Join The Battleground and fight against other players around the world while being chased by hords of mutades zombies in this post - apocalyptic world of madness.

Badlands is a online first person shooter game where you fight monsters and other players to win and rank up.

Rules:

When you start playing you will be set to one of the two teams. The Bad Guys or the Good Guys. You earn one point to your team by killing players in the opposite team and minus one by killing one of your teammates or by taking suicide.

By taking many points for your team and not dying, you earn experience points and rank up. For each time you rank up you get a new skin. You can't derank but if you do bad your experience points will decrease.
 

Gameplay: 

Movement = WASD

Left Mouse Button = Shoot

Right Mouse Button = Aim

E-Q & 1 - 5 = Switch Weapons

C = Crouch

Shift = Sprint

Space = Jump

R = Reload

Enter = Chat

Tab = Scoreboard

The game will get updated frequently with new maps, new weapons, bug fixes and much more. 

NOTE: This is only in the alpha version of the game and you may find a lot of bugs, please leave us feedback to help me in the process of making this game.
